trends: There have been no other sightings in Phnom Penh
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThese photos were fowarded to me by a colleague from work, who in turn received them from his nephew, who is an aid worker for World Vision in Thailand. The first photo shows a disc like object in the sky, rather large when in contrast to the clouds, which it seems to be illuminating. I would have thought nothing about the image, as there are various factors that could have been involved as to how it appeared, etc. But, as i looked closer, I noticed the darker pixels on the bottom of the supposed object, forming what could be a wedge. Also, the pixels are darker in the center, forming a small circle in the middle of the supposed object. I recall seeing that shape before, and surfed around You Tube until I found it. It has similar features to the NASA STS75 supposed UFO video. A few moments later, another shot was taken, with no object in the sky, but the clouds still a bit illuminated. I understand an airport is located nearby, which might be an explanation. There was also a report of an explosion of an unidentified aircraft over Viet Nam on or around May 27th, 2008, a few days after these photos were taken. As previously stated, I am a bit of a skeptic when it comes to UFO sightings over populous areas, especially in the vicinty of airports. But the shape of the object caught my attention, and I had to pass it along to the experts. Witnesses are: Ms. Heather Ellison (photographer) Ms. Samat Mark Helper (no phone #) Hope to hear from you soon, Jeff Woodward
Summary: Disc Shape appearing after illuminating clouds/wasn't visible with eye
